comments:
After editing a jsp, saving it to disk caused such an error.

Error 十二月 28, 2004 11:06:46.360 An internal error occurred during: "Updating
JSP Index".
java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: indexLocations
at
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.search.JSPSearchSupport.computeIndexLocation(JSPSearchSupport.java:453)
at
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.search.JSPSearchSupport.addJspFile(JSPSearchSupport.java:302)
at
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.search.JSPIndexManager$ProcessFilesJob.run(JSPIndexManager.java:212)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)
Are you seeing this problem with Webtools 1.0M2 and Eclipse 3.1M4?

It occurs on WTP M2 and Eclipse 3.0.1, with eclipse FTP and Webdev support
3.0.0, SpringIDE, UML2 1.0.1, and Subclipse 0.9.25 installed.

WTP M2 must be used with Eclipse 3.1M4.  It definitely won't work with 3.0 (it
takes advantage of 3.1 only features) and it likely won't work with anything
older than 3.1M2.
